about_the_game:
"Throne Clash Demo" is a minimalist strategy war game. In the game, you will command heroes, choose battle routes, purchase troops, and cleverly deploy and upgrade them. Through continuous challenges, you will overcome numerous obstacles, ultimately defeating the powerful Boss and claiming your victory.

Choose a hero

In Throne Clash Demo, heroes are the core force of the battle. Each hero has unique passive skills and powerful output capabilities, which can bring decisive advantages to the battle. Players need to carefully select the right hero according to their own game style and combat strategy.

Choose a route

Each route in the game is full of unique challenges and rich benefits. Players need to choose the route that suits them best according to the characteristics of the selected hero and the troop combination.

Combine troops

In Throne Clash Demo, players can freely combine their own troops, including knights, archers, spearmen, cavalry, etc. In-depth understanding of the principle of mutual generation and mutual restraint between arms, reasonable combination of arms, and forming a powerful lineup that can effectively restrain the enemy is the key to victory.

Deploy troops

The placement of troops has a crucial impact on the outcome of the game. Different position choices will lead to completely different combat results. Players can find the most reasonable deployment plan through multiple attempts to minimize losses and gain an advantage in the battle.

Troop Upgrade

The attributes of the troops can be significantly improved through upgrades, including attack power, health, defense, etc. Players can strengthen the specific attributes of the troops in a targeted manner according to their own combat strategies and needs to create their own powerful legion.

Key Features

  • Simple operation: The core operation of the game only requires players to reasonably place troops and command heroes. It is easy to get started, and even novice players can quickly enter the battle.

  • Free upgrade: Troops and heroes have a variety of attributes to upgrade. Players can freely choose the upgrade path according to their preferences and combat style to create personalized combat units.

  • Strong strategy: The game provides a rich combination of arms. Players can freely match different types of troops and upgrade different attributes according to the combat situation to form a diverse tactical system. Each combination has its own unique advantages and coping strategies.

  • Random combination: The enemy's combination is randomly generated, which means that each game will face different challenges and unknown enemy combinations. This design ensures the replayability of the game, allowing players to experience freshness and challenges in every game.

RockGolem are known for their high health and defense. They can withstand a lot of damage on the battlefield and create output opportunities for teammates; archers have long-range attack capabilities and can cause continuous damage to the enemy at a safe distance; footman are good at fighting cavalry and can effectively restrain the enemy's rapid assault; cavalry, with its high-speed movement and strong impact, can quickly break through the enemy formation on the battlefield and cause devastating blows to the enemy's back row.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 @ 3.1 GHz or AMD FX-6300 @ 3.5 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 or AMD R9 270 (2GB VRAM with Shader Model 5.0 or better)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770 @ 3.4 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 1600 @ 3.2 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD R9 290X (4GB VRAM with Shader Model 5.0 or better)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: In this minimalist strategy war game, you will become a commander, leading your army to resist the enemy forces. In the demo version, you can experience all the features and all the content of the first stage, including two heroes. Go ahead and take on the challenge!
